eyin wadalaha buduhi:- “manapiyewa kho bhikkhawe kammawipake pachchupattithe yehi anggehi dighehi sobhathi thani anggani dighani ghantahanthi, yehi anggehi rassehi sobhathi thani anggani rassani ghantabhanthi, yehi anggehi thulehi sobhathi thanina anggani thulani ghantabhanthi, yehi anggehi kisehi sobhathi thani anggani kisanighantabhanthi yehi anggehi puthulehi sobhathi thani anggani puthulani santabhanthi, yehi anggehi wattehi sobhathi thani anggani wattani santabhanthi .”
